item.title: Como referenciar mídias sociais
item.description: <a href="https://photos.google.com/share/AF1QipNV_mJ4fuBt9VnV7EPMJBJCneM8CC0wBl42pB_g2YyiRia-JIhMdi0Xf-X0SEcO4Q?key=UVFoMlFyYUdfRmQ0eEVicTdya1hDMmN2Ylg4Wjdn" target="_blank"><img src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/lgSJnsyvTfbo39X0FpcoOomSq8pEityNK9VeMuaRMKU3GXnQcjMt6S1ow3dm3QGqVQqsvSDCGQPnibKy0WiTX-bK8edIBRLhmtiwEqzRrllpYr4zY3wFHKAYnTV76YsgMf78Eq9Yerc=w640-h960" width="640" height="537" /></a><figcaption class="wp-caption-text"><a href="https://photos.google.com/share/AF1QipNV_mJ4fuBt9VnV7EPMJBJCneM8CC0wBl42pB_g2YyiRia-JIhMdi0Xf-X0SEcO4Q?key=UVFoMlFyYUdfRmQ0eEVicTdya1hDMmN2Ylg4Wjdn" target="_blank">New photo by Rui Ogawa / Google Photos</a></figcaption></figure> <p> Fonte: Biblioteca de Ciências Sociais Aplicadas da UFPR </p> </div> </div> </div> </div>
